title: 10/20/21 DPS Hour Best Of
itunes:title: 10/20/21 DPS Hour Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's playoff baseball games. After a few blow strike zone calls, should the league seriously consider a digital strike zone? Marcus Hayes of the Philadelphia Inquirer calls in to discuss the Ben Simmons suspension. What do the next few days look like for him? And Bob Costas tells us which player he'd let in the Hall of Fame out of Roger Clemens, Barry Bonds and Pete Rose.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
